txt.en: Ceveneth can be found in the hall of Crithost.\n\nYou should speak with Ceveneth.
'This should keep us safe for a time. You sure are a handy [placeholder]. Hopefully those who captured Cair Andros don't all come this way at once!'
Broken barricades and spots for bear traps can be found around Crithost.\n\nYou should repair barricades and set bear traps.

'Greetings, my name is Ceveneth. I am the head farmer of Crithost. It has been a difficult past few days here with the refugees coming from all over Talath Anor.

'I've been put in charge of strengthening the defences of the village but honestly I do not know much about building things. I'm as good as they come for tilling the land though!

'I could use a little help if you have a moment. Some of the barricades we made are in dire need of repair. Also, I was given these bear traps by one of the Cair Andros guards to place around the village. Perhaps those will be useful in protecting us as well?'
Ceveneth, one of Crithost's head farmers, has been put in charge of fortifying the town and could use some assistance in her task.
